text: I'm talking about using inherited values in fields.json. You can't have a gradient field inherit from a color field with the way things are. So the option is to ignore the gradient field altogether and just make 2 (or more) color fields and put them in a Gradient group, if you want value inheritance.

Hi all, I’m extending a module that was created by the HS migration team though the new fields I’ve added don’t seem to render their data correctly. The two fields with red arrows were existing and their content renders fine, though the new `text_field` I’ve added (green arrow) doesn’t render its data. Everything is published. I’m new to HS so could be missing something, any thoughts would be appreciated :thumbsup:
